Text: Really fun game, though to be honest I think I enjoyed it on PSP more.  Just felt right for a handheld and a bit ho-hum on pc.  Might be pretty good on console still.

i have everything right up until i have to double click on reuben.exe and choose my language. i choose english, then my screen goes black, and the windows error solution screen come up. it has done this multiple times but it has not been fixed. any suggestions?

@atwasoad
This appears to be a graphics card issue with the game. If you make a shortcut to the Reuben.exe file, right click on the shortcut and click properties.
Under the "Target" field add " -wimpy" to the end.

So the end of the target field should look similar to this "win32\Reuben.exe -wimpy".

Then run the game from the shortcut file, and when you get inside the game you can change the graphics back to high. Hope it helps.
please upload a copy that doesnt crash after finishing a level please :(

sorry jazah, still dident work. my comp is never good when it comes to torrents XD any other ideas?
hahaha! lol!

@atwasoad
lol!, i did had that problem too, just delete the Hoard shortcut on your desktop (that the installer made) and create a new shortcut from Reuben.exe found inside the /Hoard/Win32/ dir, no -wimpy lol

@atwasoad 
I think its because the shortcut's property (made by the installer) got the Target: correct -"C:\ProgramFiles\Hoard\win32\Reuben.exe"
but for the Start in: its only "C:\ProgramFiles\Hoard\"
So either create a new shortcut from the Reuben file or edit the original shortcut's Start in: to "C:\ProgramFiles\Hoard\win32\"
